What year was the first Jack In The Box fast food restaurant made?
In: Lifestyle › Dining Out › Jack in the Box
Rate This Answer
Jack in the Box is an American fast-food restaurant founded by Robert O. Peterson in 1951 in San Diego, California, where it is still headquartered today. In total, the chain has 2,200 locations. Thanks for using ChaCha! Answered
